TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TransactionFlowBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class TransactionFlowBindingElement Inherits BindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension
type TransactionFlowBindingElement = class inherit BindingElement interface IPolicyExportExtension

summary.span: 表示配置元素，该元素指定对绑定的事务流支持。

span.span: Represents the configuration element that specifies transaction flow support for a binding.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此元素允许你在终结点绑定设置中启用或禁用传入事务流，并允许指定传入事务所需的协议格式。This element allows you to enable or disable incoming transaction flow in an endpoint’s binding settings, as well as to specify the desired protocol format for incoming transactions. > [!CAUTION] > 使用 协议在终结点之间对事务进行流处理时，如果目标终结点尝试使用任何 之外的协议进行流处理，则可能丢失事务超时。When using the protocol to flow transactions from endpoint to endpoint, the transaction timeout can be lost if the destination endpoint attempts to flow again using any protocol other than . 这可能导致所有 跃点后面的下级节点比预期超时。This can cause all down-level nodes after the hop to timeout later than expected.

span.span: Enabling Transaction Flow

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个通道工厂，该通道工厂可用于创建指定类型的传出通道。This method creates a channel factory that can be used to make outgoing channels of the specified type. 创建通道堆栈时，基础架构会调用此方法。This method is called by the infrastructure when building the channel stack. 只有实现自定义绑定元素时，才将它用于你的代码中。You should use it in your code only when you implement a custom binding element.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 无法生成指定通道类型的通道工厂。

span.span: A channel factory for the specified channel type cannot be built.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试实际生成工厂之前应该调用此方法来检查是否可以为指定的 `TChannel` 生成 `context` 类型通道的通道工厂。You should call this method to check that the channel factory for channels of type `TChannel` can be built for the specified `context`, before attempting to actually build the factory. 请注意，如果 无法创建指定通道类型的通道工厂，则它会引发异常。Note that throws an exception if it cannot build a channel factory for the specified channel type.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement
public: override System::ServiceModel::Channels::BindingElement ^ Clone();
override this.Clone : unit -> System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement

summary.span: 创建此元素的一个副本。

span.span: Creates a duplicate of this element.
A that is a duplicate of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建此绑定元素的深层克隆。This method creates a deep clone of this binding element. 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. （这也称为复制整个对象图。）相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。(This is also called copying the entire object graph.) A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

that should be used to get the requested property.

summary.span: 从绑定堆栈的适当层获取所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Gets the typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则为所请求的类型化对象 ；如果不存在，则为 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可使用此方法来检索来自绑定元素堆栈的功能、需求和参数。You can use this method to retrieve capabilities, requirements and parameters from the binding element stack. 如果绑定元素支持返回所请求的对象，则会返回对象。If a binding element supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，就会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一个绑定元素。If not, it delegates the call down to the next binding element in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有绑定元素支持所请求的对象，该方法将返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element supported the requested object, this method returns `null`.

span.span: is .
